name: PAPERHEAD
description:
PAPERHEAD is a fast-paced shooter game with horror elements set in a world made of cardboard & paper.
Or is it?

Wield a pencil as your weapon and uncover what exactly went wrong in the secret research facility.

And why cardboard is suddenly able to...

...bleed

A game by Sasha Shipulin
Music & Sound Design by Joonas Turner

https://discord.gg/mej3emQp
https://twitter.com/PAPERHEAD_GAME
paperhead.dev@gmail.com
